 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1919&user=10620> 	
Antonio Achille joins our Group as Chief Strategy & Innovation Officer as of today, September 01 2025, reporting directly to Michael Chalhoub, CEO. 

Antonio brings over 30 years of experience in the global luxury, fashion and design industry, where he has built a strong track record in driving operational excellence and accelerating growth — both organically and through programmatic M&A.

Antonio will lead the team for Strategy, Growth, Innovation and Intelligence. In his role, he will play a pivotal part in identifying new growth opportunities, analyzing trends to position the group for success, driving innovation and delivering transformative outcomes across the Group's global footprint.

Secure File Sharing Made Simple
